sourceText: I see you are playing quietly with the Lego with concentration, Alex.
text: I see you are playing quietly with the Lego with concentration, Alex.

sourceText: It will keep the cow safe!
text: It will keep the cow safe!

sourceText: This house is going to keep our family warm and dry. You are such a good builder, Alex!
text: This house is going to keep our family warm and dry. You are such a good builder, Alex!

sourceText: Now you can help me build a house for our family to sleep in!
text: Now you can help me build a house for our family to sleep in!

sourceText: Wow! You are building such a tall and strong wall with those Legos.
text: Wow! You are building such a tall and strong wall with those Legos.
